steps.name: Setup below base api url:

elements.name: Create customer record and validate the data

steps.name: I submit scenario create new customer with alpha numeric with payload {"fname": "John123", "lname": "Adam123","addresses": [{"address": "321, Sliver rd","city": "Ashland","state": "NY","zip": "98654"}]} to api endpoint /customers

arguments.val: create new customer with alpha numeric

steps.name: I should get response status code as 201
I should get response with new customer id
I should get response with value first name as John123 and last name as Adam123
Setup below base api url:

elements.name: Create customer record and validate the data

steps.name: I submit scenario create new customer with numeric with payload {"fname": "2345123", "lname": "542342","addresses": [{"address": "321, Sliver rd","city": "Ashland","state": "NY","zip": "98654"}]} to api endpoint /customers
I should get response status code as 201
I should get response with new customer id
I should get response with value first name as 2345123 and last name as 542342

name: Customers API Unhappy path Scenarios
description: As a user, I want validate customer api Unhappy path scenarios

steps.name: Setup base url to validate happy scenarios:

elements.name: Create product record and validate the data for scenario product name with alpha only

steps.name: I submit payload {"category": "electronic", "pname": "iphonex","company": "amazon","price": "1000","pricein": "dollar"} to api endpoint /products for product
I should get product response status code as 201
I should get response with new product id
I should get category name as electronic in response
I should get product name as iphonex in response
I should get price as 1000 in response
I should get company name as amazon in response
I should get price in as dollar in response
Setup base url to validate happy scenarios:

elements.name: Create product record and validate the data for scenario product name with alpha numeric only

steps.name: I submit payload {"category": "electronic", "pname": "10210","company": "amazon","price": "1000","pricein": "dollar"} to api endpoint /products for product
I should get product response status code as 201
I should get response with new product id
I should get category name as electronic in response
I should get product name as 10210 in response
I should get price as 1000 in response
I should get company name as amazon in response
I should get price in as dollar in response
